subject: feat(setup): configure Mapbox SDK and Supabase credentials
body:
Install @rnmapbox/maps and register as Expo plugin.
Create .env with EXPO_PUBLIC_* variables mapped to project credentials.
Add src/lib/mapbox.ts for centralized Mapbox initialization.
Update USER_ACTIONS.md with Supabase link/push steps (blocked by network).

Tags: mapbox, supabase, config, setup
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: infrastructure
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: project-setup
Semver: minor
